value:
Wish I could find accessories with a
cherry-blossom pattern. But this place
seems more Nohr than Hoshido.

I'm Lady Sakura's retainer. And I'm
her best friend. No sky knight is going
to outdo me. Who do I mean?$k$pOh...never mind.

Checking up on everyone, huh?
Lady Sakura does that. You seem
just as thoughtful.

I'll protect you on the battlefield
since you don't have a weapon.
It'd be nice to spar though!

Hya! And...hyaaa! All right, that's
enough katana practice for now.
I never miss a single day!

Oh, I finally found you,
$Nu!$k$pMaybe we can spar soon, but first
I've got to say hello...on behalf
of $Nf!
I'm so proud of myself!
Guess all that training paid off.
That hardly made a difference!

Yay! What an improvement!
I can't wait to test it out!

Samurai Hana at your service! I'm from
Hoshido. Want to spar for a while?
Or maybe later?$k$pI want to be as skilled with a sword
as my father was. So, I'm always
up for a challenge!

Hya! And...hyaaa-hyaaa! Whew.
That's enough training for now.
I think I did pretty well!$k$pWhat? My footwork was a little
sloppy? And my follow-up was slow?
And I wasn't flexible enough?$k$pYikes, Commander, you're so
picky!$k$pHuh? So what if I called you my
commander? You're really the most
important one around here.$k$pOh, come on! You know it! I know it!
Everyone knows it! Don't be
so modest.$k$pI didn't mean to demote anyone
else around here. I'll just let it
be our little nickname...$k$pOK, Commander?
せいっ！
はあっ！！
ひゃっ！
You're strong...
It's all me!
With all my strength!
You're mine!
Now, it's my turn!
Sorry...
Heehee
I try to slip in some katana practice whenever I can!
Don't you just want to explore this whole world?
I want to learn all about how the Order of Heroes trains!
Wish we could spar! But I know you're not equipped to fight.
My dream is to become a great samurai! Just like my father was.
Where is Lady Sakura? I'm supposed to always be with her!
Keep sending me at tough enemies. That's how I'll get stronger!
OK!
Who next?
All right!
